short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and copy font properties effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Font Fetcher is a user-friendly, accessible tool designed for obtaining the font properties of any text you see on the web. If you are browsing the web, and you see a text you like, simply right click the text, and select "Get Font Properties" in the context menu.  You can now view your desired font properties, and hold 'Shift' to move your cursor and toggle the copy them to your clipboard.
